data.text: @sammyboyfor @1NewsNZ 😂😂😂. Japan and NZ have comparable rates of cases (and vaccinations), which are amongst the lowest in the world. NZ has a lower death rate. Population densities are largely irrelevant - the Japanese can still manage social distancing. Anti-mandate troll!

@ScientistBlood @1NewsNZ Wish it was true but that's nothing more than conjecture. Japan seems to be doing fine without mandates lower cases per million than NZ despite much higher population densities.
@sammyboyfor @1NewsNZ Rubbish. More unvaccinated people back in the workplace will lead to more infection, and more spread.

@sammyboyfor @1NewsNZ No they wouldn't because you'd have more people actually sick or hospitalised with COVID, so the net result would be the same. Plus the hospitals wouldn't have the staff or room for those who need health services for other reasons.
@1NewsNZ If the mandates were dumped things would be back to normal in days.

@1NewsNZ "The Last Days of the Covidian Cult" "The official Covid narrative is finally falling apart, or is being hastily disassembled, or historically revised, right before our eyes. the “Apocalyptic Pandemic” PSYOP has reached its expiration date" https://t.co/0pGjUDHWAf

@1NewsNZ The Covidian Cult (Part III) - "A new form of totalitarianism, a globalized, pathologized, depoliticized form, which is being systematically implemented under the guise of “protecting the public health.”"
https://t.co/VyT9GBAksx

@1NewsNZ The Covidian Cult (Part II) - "millions of people continue to behave like members of an enormous death cult, walking around in public with medical-looking masks, robotically repeating vacuous platitudes" #covid19 https://t.co/pPk6xLHHEM
